gateway:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    AUTH_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3001
    USERS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3002
    NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3003
    CHAT_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3004
    PONG_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3005
    TRIS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3006
    FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:443
    PORT=3000
    DOC_USERNAME=admin
    DOC_PASSWORD=admin
    USE_HTTPS=true
    HTTPS_CERTS_PATH=../../certs/certs/
    RATE_LIMIT_ACTIVE=true

services/auth:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET=your_access_token_secret
    ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRATION=15m
    REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET=your_refresh_token_secret
    PORT=3001
    REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRATION_DAYS=7
    HASH_SALT_ROUNDS=10
    OTP_EXPIRATION_MINUTES=5
    USERS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3002
    NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3003
    PONG_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3005
    TRIS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3006

services/users:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    PORT=3002
    AUTH_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3001
    NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3003

services/notification:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    PORT=3003
    SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
    SMTP_PORT=587
    SMTP_USER=43skhool@gmail.com
    SMTP_PASS=udkh apxb ltsl iikp
    USERS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3002

services/chat:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    PORT=3004
    USERS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3002
    NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3003

services/pong:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    PORT=3005
    NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3003

services/tris:
    INTERNAL_API_KEY=1234
    PORT=3006
    NOTIFICATION_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3003
    USERS_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3002
    MAX_MARKS_PER_PLAYER=3
